attributes.action: Bring Care Homes into the NHS, funded from taxation
attributes.additional_details: The Covid 19 epidemic within Care Homes has demonstrated that the current Care Home system, separate from the NHS, with poorly paid staff and exposed residents does not work.
attributes.background: Care Homes are providing a care service to our aging population, many giving clinical care, and should be integrated within the NHS.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319117
